test.name: Teste 1 Abrir o Google e pesquisar

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Robot Framework' into text field 'name=q'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.msg: Text 'Robot Framework' did not appear in 5 seconds.
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
kw.status: Text 'Robot Framework' did not appear in 5 seconds.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
Executar Teste 2
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Robot Framework' into text field 'name=q'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ENTER to element.
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
Este teste abre o Firefox somente se o primeiro teste falhar , pesquisa "Robot Framework" verifica o resultado e sai da página.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

test.doc: Este teste abre o Google, pesquisa "Robot Framework" verifica o resultado e sai da página.
test.status: Text 'Robot Framework' did not appear in 5 seconds.
